General.Name: Victory New Materials Ltd Co
General.Description: Victory New Materials Limited Company manufactures and sells shoe materials in China and internationally. Its products include soles for sports shoes, casual shoes, etc.; EVO particles; traditional two pase sole; one phase injection single color sole; one phase injection dual color dual density sole; material preparation; injection formation; and toys. Victory New Materials Limited Company was incorporated in 2012 and is based in Jinjiang, China.
